text: After combining the humidity control inputs with the aerosolized virus , input flow was directed through a series of baffles that promoted droplet drying and mixing to produce an even particle distribution and stable humidity 34 . The RH and temperature inside the irradiation chamber were monitored using an Omega RH32 meter ( Omega Engineering Inc . , Stamford , CT ) immediately following the baffles . A Hal Technologies HAL - HPC300 particle sizer ( Fontana , CA ) was adjoined to the irradiation chamber to allow for sampling of particle sizes throughout operation .
